publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-437 Angus MacKay: Tackling Drug Misuse in Scotland—That the Parliament commends the multi-agency role of the key agencies across Scotland in implementing Tackling Drugs in Scotland: Action in Partnership; acknowledges the Executive’s support for the agencies involved in implementing the priorities and strategy, and welcomes the Executive’s cross-cutting approach and the efforts being made to reverse the tragic level of drug deaths and drug misuse in Scotland.
